quizzes.title: Present Simple - Quick Practice
quizzes.description: Test your understanding of Present Simple

questions.question: She ___ to school every day.
questions.explanation: Use 'goes' (base verb + s) with 'she' because it's third person singular.

questions.question: They ___ English at university.
questions.explanation: Use 'study' (base form) with 'they' because it's plural. No 's' needed.

questions.question: My brother ___ in a hospital. (work)
questions.explanation: Use 'works' (base verb + s) with 'my brother' (he) because it's third person singular.

questions.question: I ___ coffee every morning.
questions.explanation: Use 'drink' (base form) with 'I'. Don't add 's' for first person.

questions.question: The sun ___ in the east. (rise)
questions.explanation: Use 'rises' (base verb + s) with 'the sun' (it) because it's third person singular. This is a general truth.

questions.question: Water ___ at 100 degrees Celsius.
questions.explanation: Use 'boils' for general scientific facts. Water (it) is third person singular.

questions.question: My parents ___ in London. (live)
questions.explanation: Use 'live' (base form) with 'my parents' (they) because it's plural.

questions.question: He ___ his homework after dinner.
questions.explanation: Use 'does' with 'he' (third person singular). 'Do' becomes 'does' for he/she/it.

questions.question: She ___ three languages. (speak)
questions.explanation: Use 'speaks' with 'she' (third person singular). Add 's' to the base verb.

questions.question: We ___ to the gym twice a week.
questions.explanation: Use 'go' (base form) with 'we' (plural). No 's' needed for we/they.
